name: @cameronhunter/typescript-project
description: A template repository for creating npm packages using TypeScript

scripts.//: Github publish needs to be last because we might rewrite the name property to include the scope
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm run publish:npm && pnpm run publish:github
scripts.publish:github: pnpm run github:set_scope && npm_config_registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com/ pnpm changeset publish
scripts.//: If the package isn't alreay scoped, we'll automatically rename it to include the Github username as the scope.
scripts.github:set_scope: jq --arg githubScope "$GITHUB_REPOSITORY_OWNER" '.name |= (if (index("@") == null) then "@" + $githubScope + "/" + . else . end)' package.json > package-github.json && mv package-github.json package.json

author: Cameron Hunter <hello@cameronhunter.co.uk>
